attributes.action: Suspension of Human Rights for Violent Criminals and Terrorists
attributes.additional_details: Recognising the Trauma and upset that Violent Criminals and Terrorists cause to their victims and also recognising that the above mentioned people have already violated the human rights of others wilfully, I hereby propose that Violent Criminals and Terrorists have their Human Rights revoked due to their actions, this should also include their right to life only were they have robbed others of their right to life.
